babble.net.http

Class HttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • babble.net.NioClient<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
      • babble.net.http.HttpClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResponseCallback, Runnable

    public class HttpClient
extends NioClient<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
implements ResponseCallback
    A Client using JSON-RPC protocol. The program accepts a server URI, sends JSON messages reading from standard input.
    Author:
    pinaki poddar

      • onResponse

        public void onResponse(byte[] bytes,
                       boolean eos)
        Description copied from interface: ResponseCallback
        Invoked when response is available. For streaming response, this can be invoked multiple times to deliver chunks of responses. The end-of-stream is signaled by the boolean parameter.
        Specified by:
        onResponse in interface ResponseCallback
        Parameters:
        bytes - raw byte data of the response. Never null.
        eos - true indicates end of stream

      • onError

        public void onError(Exception ex)
        Description copied from interface: ResponseCallback
        Invoked when an error occurred to process a request.
        Specified by:
        onError in interface ResponseCallback
        Parameters:
        ex - an exception raised during request processing.
